data.title: Brookfield Says Rents for ‘Quality’ New York Offices Are Surging
data.meta_description: Brookfield Asset Management Inc. said rents for “quality” office buildings in New York climbed more than 30% from pre-pandemic levels.
data.text:
Brookfield Asset Management Inc. said rents for “quality” office buildings in New York climbed more than 30% from pre-pandemic levels.

Rental rates need to be higher for new buildings to account for the more than 20% increase in costs to build those properties, Chief Executive Officer Bruce Flatt said in a letter to shareholders as the firm issued first-quarter earnings.
